[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/webpack4-module-minifier-plugin](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.md) &gt; [CHUNK_MODULES_TOKEN](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.chunk_modules_token.md)

## CHUNK_MODULES_TOKEN variable

Token to replace the object or array of module definitions so that the minifier can operate on the Webpack runtime or chunk boilerplate in isolation

**Signature:**

```typescript
CHUNK_MODULES_TOKEN: '__WEBPACK_CHUNK_MODULES__';
```
